selected_quotes: We are not yet capable of designing a tailored weight loss diet based on individual genetics.
Weight loss is weight loss and nutrigenetic diets don't help!
Las dietas personalizadas con test nutrigenéticos no obtienen mejores resultados de pérdida de peso
nutrigenetic-based diet did not increase weight loss compared with a standard balanced diet @picardonhealth

citation.abstract: & Aims: Many companies provide genetic tests for obesity-related polymorphisms (nutrigenetics) and make dietary recommendations for weight loss based on the results. We performed a randomized controlled trial to determine whether more participants who followed a nutrigenetic-guided diet lost ≥5% of their body weight than participants on a standard balanced diet, for 8 and 24 weeks.
citation.title: Differences in Weight Loss Between Persons on Standard Balanced vs Nutrigenetic Diets in a Randomized Controlled Trial

news.title: Nutrigenetic-Based Diet Doesn't Increase Weight Loss
news.summary: MONDAY, Oct. 5, 2015 (HealthDay News) -- A nutrigenetic-based diet does not increase weight loss, compared with a standard balanced diet, according to a study published in the September issue of Clinical Gastroenterology and Hepatology.

news.title: Nutrigenetic-Based Diet Doesn't Increase Weight Loss
news.summary: Share this article: (HealthDay News) — A nutrigenetic-based diet does not increase weight loss, compared with a standard balanced diet, according to a study published in the September issue of Clinical Gastroenterology and Hepatology.
